abstract: Virginia State Police report fatal shooting of an 18-year-old man in a store parking lot by a Portsmouth police officer responding to a call about shoplifting.
lead_paragraph: A Portsmouth police officer responding to a call about shoplifting shot and killed an 18-year-old man in a Walmart parking lot on Wednesday morning, the authorities said.
snippet: A Portsmouth police officer responding to a call about shoplifting shot and killed an 18-year-old man in a Walmart parking lot on Wednesday morning, the authorities said.
